attributes.name: Xiaomi Mi A2 Lite
attributes.info: The Mi A2 Lite is not your regular budget smartphone - it has a high-res notched screen with slim bezels, a dual-camera on its back, a very large battery, and runs on the latest vanilla Android OS.

attributes.name: Samsung Galaxy S9
attributes.info: It's true what they say - you don't fix what's not broken. And that's what Samsung did for the Galaxy S9 - it didn't change what was already great, it just tweaked specs wherever possible.

attributes.name: Oppo F7
attributes.info: Selfies are an inevitable part of our lives and they have prevailed over the skeptics into a bright, if not predominant future.

attributes.name: Samsung Galaxy S8
attributes.info: When 5 inches is the de-facto standard for a compact Android handset, yet you want to prove that more is always better, what do you do? Well, it depends on the definition of more.

attributes.name: Xiaomi Pocophone F1
attributes.info: Xiaomi's announcements have been relatively predictable so far, but the introduction of a new Poco sub-brand was a surprising move.

attributes.name: Apple iPhone X 64GB
attributes.info: The anniversary iPhone is here. The iPhone X. Or the iPhone 10. The name is as confusing as the product itself is game-changing.

attributes.name: Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max
attributes.info: It's September and the well-oiled Apple marketing machine is in full swing yet again. Apple's iPhone event this fall brought us the iPhone 11 trio.

attributes.name: Realme X3 SuperZoom
attributes.info: Realme often has us wondering what's what in its portfolio and where new models fit in the existing lineup.

attributes.name: Asus ROG Phone II ZS660KL
attributes.info: Asus and more specifically the Republic of Gamers division has always been pretty straight-forward about its smartphone goals and priorities.

attributes.name: Huawei P40 Lite
attributes.info: Huawei has never been loud with its Lite series and the P40 Lite is not getting a special treatment either.

attributes.name: Honor 10X Lite
attributes.info: It's a fast-paced industry, and six months sounds like a long time for a phone to go without a successor.

attributes.name: Acer Liquid Z6 Plus
attributes.info: While Sony unveiled high-end smartphones and Huawei focused on midrangers, Acer had the low-cost options.

attributes.name: Google Pixel 3
attributes.info: Bringing the small Pixel into the now with a tall display and less wasted space, we have this year's Google Pixel 3.

attributes.name: Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max
attributes.info: There are four new models in Series 12, ranging from the 5.4" mini to the 6.7" Pro Max.

attributes.name: Google Pixel 5
attributes.info: This year, Google has taken a drastically different approach with the Pixel lineup.
